lessons.what: Pushed code directly to production without sandbox
lessons.lesson: ALWAYS work in sandbox first, never push to production without user approval
EVERY task gets its own Telegram topic, no exceptions
Always take screenshots with Puppeteer and send to topic before asking for approval

lessons.what: Orchestrator coded instead of delegating to koder
lessons.lesson: Orchestrator must DELEGATE to agents, never code directly

lessons.what: isBall variable undefined in modal tabs
lessons.lesson: Always check variable scope when using variables in array definitions
Specific routes must come BEFORE parameterized routes in Express

lessons.what: trust proxy not set for rate limiter
lessons.lesson: Behind nginx, always set app.set('trust proxy', 1) for express-rate-limit
